channel.title: Machine Learning on Gumeo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Gumeo's Blog

item.title: My first post
item.description: Starting a blog The plan is to try to do weekly to monthly blogposts about something interesting I learn. I might also write up technical details about setting something up as a reference for my future self. I chose to use the blogdown package to manage this blog, with the hugo theme purehugo. The main reason I chose this is because I think it scales well for mobile devices and it looks clean and minimal.
